text: Built with nice architecture and ambience with modern concepts. Not only books and dvds as in an ordinary library. You can learn about architecture related things. For an example about different surfaces samples are stored in one section. You can study them there it self. Also lot of iMacs are provided all over the library. Enough free space for individuals or groups to work.
Spacious library with nice interiors. Books selection, meeting rooms and study space are limited but still a good place to meet, read, relax and study.
Good place to study, but relatively short operating hours compare to other uni. (Weekend only opens for few hours)
Nice ambience and lotsa of natural lighting and location for self reading
Great selection of books. Humanities, maths, programming, etc. They also regularly display student projects.
